## PopulatableStabilio.transferCollateralGainToTrove() method

Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transferCollateralGainToTrove(): Promise<PopulatedStabilioTransaction<P, SentStabilioTransaction<S, StabilioReceipt<R, CollateralGainTransferDetails>>>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedStabilioTransaction](./lib-base.populatedstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentStabilioTransaction](./lib-base.sentstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [StabilioReceipt](./lib-base.stabilioreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [CollateralGainTransferDetails](./lib-base.collateralgaintransferdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

The collateral gain is transfered to the Trove as additional collateral.

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [STBL reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.stblreward.md)<!-- -->.
